sourcesContent:
import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { UserService } from './../services/user.service'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../models/User'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { message: string=""; username: string=""; password: string=""; tip: string=""; constructor(private userService:UserService,private router:Router){} login(){ if (this.username == "") { this.message = "Nije uneto korisnicko ime"; } else if (this.password == "") { this.message = "Nije uneta lozinka"; } this.userService.login(this.username,this.password).subscribe((userFromDB:User)=>{ if(userFromDB!=null){ if(userFromDB.type==0){ this.router.navigate(['user']); }else{ this.router.navigate(['admin']); } } }) } }
